snippet: The CME Group, the owner of the Chicago Mercantile Exchange, the Chicago Board of Trade and the New York Mercantile Exchange, said on Wednesday that it had agreed to buy the Kansas City Board of Trade, the leading futures market for hard red winter...
abstract: The CME Group, the owner of the Chicago Mercantile Exchange, the Chicago Board of Trade and the New York Mercantile Exchange, said on Wednesday that it had agreed to buy the Kansas City Board of Trade, the leading futures market for hard red winter wheat, for $126 million in cash.
lead_paragraph: The CME Group, the owner of the Chicago Mercantile Exchange, the Chicago Board of Trade and the New York Mercantile Exchange, said on Wednesday that it had agreed to buy the Kansas City Board of Trade, the leading futures market for hard red winter wheat, for $126 million in cash. Read more »
